info.description:
=================
PyGLW Info
=================
**PyGLW** is a PyOpenGL Wrapper that is similar to pyglet.
It uses PIL to load images(**pyglw.lib.loadImage** function is still in development mode! Don't use it! Or if you are an expert, you may help debug) and PyOpenGL to do everything else.
Apart from the above mentioned libraries, PyGLW requires nothing else to function.
It cannot load sounds(yet), but that is sure to come with future versions.
info.keywords: PyOpenGL, OpenGL, graphics, game development, wrapper, interface
info.name: PyGLW
